quotes.text: 7.7/10: too much Yamcha!

quotes: All men are created equal... except Yamcha, he sucks!

quotes: Fighters train with punching bags the same way punching bags train with Yamcha

quotes.text: George Lucas followed Yamcha's advice. Thus the prequels were made

quotes: For some reason, there's a locker named Yamcha. It never locks

quotes: Lightning never strikes twice... unless Yamcha's the target
